scripts.kill-servers: pkill -f 'dw-serve' || true && pkill -f 'vite' || true && pkill -f 'uvicorn' || true
scripts.start: npm run kill-servers && concurrently "npm run backend" "npm run dev"
scripts.start:dev: npm run kill-servers && concurrently --names "API,WEB,MONITOR" --prefix-colors "blue,green,magenta" "npm run backend" "npm run dev" "node enrichment-monitor-optimized.mjs"
scripts.start:dev:optimized: npm run kill-servers && concurrently --names "API,WEB,MONITOR" --prefix-colors "blue,green,magenta" "npm run backend" "npm run dev" "node enrichment-monitor-optimized.mjs"
